LanguageData.RE_DrellSoulModeDesc: Body and soul work as one in a whole person. When the soul is weakened by despair or fear, when the body is ill or injured the individual is disconnected - no longer whole. Classic RimWorld pawn experience.
LanguageData.RE_DrellBodyModeDesc: The body is not our true self - the soul is. The body can serve as a tool for others to use as they see fit. Disables mood and mental breaks, as well as skill loss and gain.
